Package com.github.actionfx.core.container

Interface BeanContainerFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractActionFXBeanContainer, DefaultActionFXBeanContainer
    public interface BeanContainerFacade
    Facade for accessing a bean container holding necessary view and controller instances.
    Author:
    koster

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String ACTIONFX_BEANNAME
      The bean name of ActionFX itself.
      static java.lang.String ACTIONFX_EXTENSION_BEANNAME
      The bean name of an ActionFXExtensionsBean holding all user defined controller and bean extensions.
      static java.lang.String BEAN_DEFINITION_POSTPROCESSOR_BEANNAME
      The bean name of the bean definition post processor adding features to ActionFX bean definitions.
      static java.lang.String CONTROLLER_INSTANCE_POSTPROCESSOR_BEANNAME
      The bean name of the controller instance post processor adding features to ActionFX controllers.
      static java.lang.String CONVERSION_SERVICE_BEANNAME
      The bean name of ConversionService for converting data types.
      static java.lang.String DIALOG_CONTROLLER_BEANNAME
      The bean name of DialogController for dialog support.
      static java.lang.String EVENT_BUS_BEANNAME
      The bean name of the used PriorityAwareEventBus implementation.
      static java.lang.String LOCALE_BEANNAME
      The bean name of the application Locale.
      static java.lang.String LOCALE_PROPERTY_BEANNAME
      The bean name of an ObservableValue holding the application locale.

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      void addActionFXBeans​(ActionFX actionFX)
      Adds ActionFX-specific beans to the implementing bean container, such as: The configured ActionFX locale Configured custom ActionFX extensions defined in ActionFXExtensionsBean.

      Adds a new controller bean definition to the bean container.
      default java.lang.String deriveBeanId​(java.lang.Class<?> beanClazz)
      Derives an ID from the given beanClazz under that the component shall be stored and retrieved at.

      Gets a bean from the underlying bean container by the bean type described by beanClass.

      Retrieves the resource bundle holding internationalized texts for the given controllerClass and supplied Locale.
      void runComponentScan​(java.lang.String rootPackage)
      Populates the container with view components by scanning the given rootPackage and its subpackages for annotated classes relevant for ActionFX.

        The bean name of an ObservableValue holding the application locale.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LOCALE_BEANNAME

        static final java.lang.String LOCALE_BEANNAME
        The bean name of the application Locale. Preferably use LOCALE_PROPERTY_BEANNAME (which is an ObservableValue), because classes using the Locale directly are not notified on potential changes.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTIONFX_BEANNAME

        static final java.lang.String ACTIONFX_BEANNAME
        The bean name of ActionFX itself. ActionFX can be injected via @Inject into controller classes.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • addActionFXBeans

        void addActionFXBeans​(ActionFX actionFX)
        Adds ActionFX-specific beans to the implementing bean container, such as:
        • The configured ActionFX locale
        • Configured custom ActionFX extensions defined in ActionFXExtensionsBean.
        • The ActionFX instance itself
        Parameters:
        actionFX - the ActionFX instance

      • runComponentScan

        void runComponentScan​(java.lang.String rootPackage)
        Populates the container with view components by scanning the given rootPackage and its subpackages for annotated classes relevant for ActionFX.
        Parameters:
        rootPackage - the root package that acts as source for view components

      • addBeanDefinition

        void addBeanDefinition​(java.lang.String id,
                       java.lang.Class<?> beanClass,
                       boolean singleton,
                       boolean lazyInit,
                       java.util.function.Supplier<?> instantiationSupplier)
        Adds a new bean definition to the bean container.
        Parameters:
        id - the bean ID / name
        beanClass - the bean type
        singleton - true, if the created instance of the bean shall be a singleton, false, if there should be a new instance created, whenever getBean(Class) is called.
        lazyInit - Flag that controls the initialization of the view and controller. If set to true, beans are lazily initialized at the point the bean is really required and requested to be used. If set to {@link false}, the beans are initialized at the startup of the ActionFX application, when the view manager is initialized. Although lazy loading should be preferred, disabling of lazy loading makes sense, when you want to have a fail-early fail-fast pattern and exceptions during view initializations should/must be thrown at application startup (and not later, when you already work with the application).
        instantiationSupplier - the supplier that provides the instance

      • addControllerBeanDefinition

        void addControllerBeanDefinition​(java.lang.Class<?> controllerClass)
        Adds a new controller bean definition to the bean container. It is expected that the controller class is annotated by AFXController.
        Parameters:
        beanClass - the controller bean type

      • getBean

        <T> T getBean​(java.lang.String id)
        Gets a bean from the underlying bean container by ID.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the bean
        Parameters:
        id - the bean ID
        Returns:
        the bean instance

      • getBean

        <T> T getBean​(java.lang.Class<T> beanClass)
        Gets a bean from the underlying bean container by the bean type described by beanClass.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the bean
        Parameters:
        beanClass - the bean class
        Returns:
        the bean instance

      • resolveResourceBundle

        java.util.ResourceBundle resolveResourceBundle​(java.lang.Class<?> controllerClass,
                                               java.util.Locale locale)
        Retrieves the resource bundle holding internationalized texts for the given controllerClass and supplied Locale.
        Parameters:
        controllerClass - the controller class for that the resource bundle shall be retrieved
        locale - the locale
        Returns:
        the resolved resource bundle

      • deriveBeanId

        default java.lang.String deriveBeanId​(java.lang.Class<?> beanClazz)
        Derives an ID from the given beanClazz under that the component shall be stored and retrieved at.

        The default implementation takes the simple class name and decapitalizes the first letter.

        Example: 

         deriveBeanId(SomeController.class) = "someController"

 
        

        

        Parameters:
        

        beanClazz - the controller class
        

        Returns:
        

        the derived controller ID
